Title: Modifies the retirement program for Triborough bridge and tunnel members
Summary: Modifies the retirement program for Triborough bridge and tunnel members to a twenty-year retirement program; clarifies the statutory peace officer designation of certain employees of the Triborough bridge and tunnel authority.
LawCode: Amd ยง604-c, R & SS L; amd ยง2.10, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to modifying the retirement program for Triborough bridge and tunnel members; to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to clarifying the statutory peace officer designation of certain employees of the Triborough bridge and tunnel authority; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions
